summary: JUST BOUGHT THIS CAR TWO MONTHS AGO.  AT RANDOM, AND WHEN MAKING A LEFT ONTO A BUSY STREET, ACCELERATING FROM A STOP LIGHT,  THERE IS A HESITATION AND A VERY QUICK SHUT DOWN WHEN ACCELERATING.
